abstract: Discover Financial Services has agreed to settle an antitrust lawsuit it filed in 2004 against card networks Visa and MasterCard. Discover had been seeking about $6 billion in damages, as it contended the card networks had harmed its business by preventing their member banks from issuing credit cards for Discover’s network.
lead_paragraph: Discover Financial Services has agreed to settle an antitrust lawsuit it filed in 2004 against card networks Visa and MasterCard. Discover had been seeking about $6 billion in damages, as it contended the card networks had harmed its business by preventing their member banks from issuing credit cards for Discover’s network.

headline.main: Discover, Visa And MasterCard Settle Antitrust Suit
